parameters.emailMessage/Subject: Supply Submissions Failed: Item has status "Reject"
parameters.emailMessage/Body:
A workflow cannot be restarted with a status of "Reject". It must be either "Pending" or "Incomplete".

Click the following link to be taken back to the item:
@{triggerOutputs()?['body/{Link}']}

An incorrect status value has been used to restart the workflow. Please check the documentation for the correct value.
Status value is:  @{triggerOutputs()?['body/Status/Value']}

Click the following link to be taken back to the item:
@{triggerOutputs()?['body/{Link}']}

Condition_22_Check_Status.description: Checking Status to stop processing.  Stops on a Reject or Complete

parameters.emailMessage/Subject: A new Supply Submission (@{triggerOutputs()?['body/ID']}) has been created for @{triggerOutputs()?['body/Title']}
parameters.emailMessage/Body:
For production change email to Cathy Knight, Peter Barone, Kristen Crowley, Stephen Paparatto, Edison Lucero, Maria Mora

A new Supply Submission (@{triggerOutputs()?['body/ID']}) has been created for @{triggerOutputs()?['body/Title']}.

Please review this submission and send the requested quantities: Click Here

Submission ID: @{triggerOutputs()?['body/ID']}
Submission Date: @{body('Convert_Created_Time')}
Details:

Shirts Requested: @{outputs('Get_item')?['body/Shirts_x0020_Requested/Value']}
Quantity of Shirts Requested: @{variables('varHDQtyShirtsRequested')}

FedEx Shipping Labels Requested: @{outputs('Get_item')?['body/FedEx_x0020_Shiping_x0020_Labels/Value']}
Quantity FedEx Shipping Labels Requested: @{variables('varHDQtyFedExShippingLabelsRequested')}

Ziplocs Requested: @{outputs('Get_item')?['body/Ziplocs_x0020_Requested/Value']}
Quantity of Ziplocs Requested: @{variables('varHDQtyZipRequested')}

Pill Counter Requested: @{outputs('Get_item')?['body/Pill_x0020_Counter_x0020_Request/Value']}
Quantity of Pill Counters Requested: @{variables('varHDQtyPillCounterRequested')}

Packing Pouches Requested: @{outputs('Get_item')?['body/Packing_x0020_Pouches_x0020_Requ/Value']}
Quantity of Packing Pouches Requested: @{variables('varHDQtyPackingPouchesRequested')}

Small Tamper Proof Bags Requested: @{outputs('Get_item')?['body/Small_x0020_Tamper_x0020_Proof_x/Value']}
Quantity of Small Bags Requested: @{variables('varHDQtySmallTamperProofBagsRequested')}

Large Tamper Proof Bags Requested: @{outputs('Get_item')?['body/Large_x0020_Tamper_x0020_Proof_x/Value']}
Qty Large  Bags: @{variables('varHDQtyLargeTamperProofBagsRequested')} 

RFID Labels Requested: @{outputs('Get_item')?['body/RFID_x0020_Labels_x0020_requeste/Value']}
Quantity of RFID Labels Requested: @{variables('varHDQtyRFIDLabelsRequested')}

Grey Labels Requested: @{outputs('Get_item')?['body/Grey_x0020_Labels_x0020_Requeste/Value']}
Quantity of of Grey Labels Requested: @{variables('varHDQtyGreyLabelsRequested')}

222 Forms Requested: @{outputs('Get_item')?['body/OData__x0032_22_x0020_Forms_x0020_Requ/Value']}
Quantity of 222 Forms Requested: @{variables('varHDQty222FormsRequested')}

Additional Details (if applicable): @{triggerOutputs()?['body/Additional_x0020_Details']}


Link to item: "@{outputs('Get_item')?['body/{Link}']}"

parameters.emailMessage/Subject: Thank You! Your Supply Submission (#@{triggerOutputs()?['body/ID']}) has been created
parameters.emailMessage/Body:
Hello @{triggerOutputs()?['body/Author/DisplayName']},

Your supply submission was created successfully. Please be patient while your submission is fulfilled.

Requested for: @{triggerOutputs()?['body/Title']}
Submission ID: @{triggerOutputs()?['body/ID']}
Submission Date: @{body('Convert_Created_Time')}

You can review your submission with the following link:
"@{triggerOutputs()?['body/{Link}']}"


Thank you.

parameters.emailMessage/Subject: Changes to Supply Submission (@{triggerOutputs()?['body/ID']} Failed: Incomplete
parameters.emailMessage/Body:
The flow failed because all items in the send portion of the form were listed as "No". Please set the status to "Incomplete" and try again. If you are sending an item, that item needs to be listed as "Yes".
